seller_description: This adhesive tape offers excellent holding power, ensuring that the package stays securely sealed. It features a wide service temperature range, making it suitable for most applications, and adheres easily to even slightly irregular surfaces. Non-toxic and conforming to ASTM D-4236 standards, it provides a safe and reliable solution for a variety of packaging and sealing needs.
review: Delivered product is a transparent tape while the product description as per the picture was not.

It is non-toxic and conforms to ASTM D-4236 standards, providing a safe and reliable solution for packaging and sealing. The buyer's review expresses dissatisfaction, stating that the delivered product was a transparent tape, while the product description and image suggested something different. This discrepancy suggests that the buyer expected a product that matched the visual representation in the listing but received something else.
